department: Public Works and Government Services of Canada
short_summary: Regional Individual Standing Offers for supply of Miscellaneous Groceries to 4 Wing Cold Lake, Alberta.
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Western Region, is seeking Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO's) for the supply, delivery and offloading of Miscellaneous Groceries on an as and when requested basis to 4 Wing Cold Lake located at Cold Lake, Alberta, for the period of the Standing Offer.
tags: Public Works and Government Services of Canada
full_summary:
================
### Tender Title - English
**Title of Contract**: Miscellaneous Groceries - Supply, Delivery, and Offloading for 4 Wing Cold Lake

### Tender Title - French
**Titre de la Marche**: Produits d’épicerie divers - Fourniture, livraison et déchargement pour la 4e Escadre Cold Lake

### Reference
**Reference Number**: WS3941225772-Doc4519670371
**Version**: 5 (Amended)

### Notice Details
* **Notice Date**: 16 Apr 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 15 Jul 2024, 14:00 EDT

### Contract Period
* **Contract Start Date**: 01 Sept 2023
* **Contract End Date**: 31 Aug 2024

### Procurement Details
* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RISO)
* **Goods and Services**: Supply, delivery, and offloading of miscellaneous groceries
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Cold Lake, Alberta

### Eligibility Requirements
* **Eligible Bidders**: Suppliers must hold a valid GSIN (none provided) and must be registered under the CFTA
* **Language Requirements**: Bidders must provide their proposal in English and French

### Contact Information
* **Contact Person**: Rina Marsland
* **Email Address**: [rina.marsland@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rina.marsland@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone/ Fax**: None
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19418915?extsite=MTk0MTg5MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19418915?extsite=MTk0MTg5MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Friends, and terms included
Price selection criteria is the lowest price. There is no limit to the number of bidders.

This rewritten text has followed the Government of Canada's standard English template and revised the essential details of the case, all in a much nicer format. I tried to include
